official_title: Resolved, That the following-named Member be, and is hereby elected a Member of the following standing committee of the House of Representatives: Delbert L. Latta of Ohio:  Committee on the Judiciary.

summary.text: Provides for the election of Delbert L. Latta of Ohio to the Committee on the Judiciary.

titles.title: Resolved, That the following-named Member be, and is hereby elected a Member of the following standing committee of the House of Representatives: Delbert L. Latta of Ohio:  Committee on the Judiciary.
